title: Did WTC's tenant buy a terrorist insurance before September 11th?
subtitle: According to an ancient urban legend, Larry Silverstein, a tenant of the World Trade Center, "incidentally," released terrorist insurance just months before the September 11 attacks.
author: David Emery
vclaim: Larry Silverstein, the owner of the World Trade Center's lease, bought a counter-terrorism insurance two months before September 11th, and then collected double his value on the grounds that there had been two attacks.
